content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nice task.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It's fun!

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: it's easy and important

Your contribution has been uploaded twice. Please remove one of them. The other link is:
https://www.codingame.com/contribute/view/738370dfde913a9cbc40763c82d11fd79f523

Goal section
* Please format "T", "J", "Tom wins" and "Jerry wins" as {{constants}} and remove the quotation marks.

* Please mention how each position should be represented in the output (e.g. the leftmost character is at position 0, and the position increases to the right, 1 position per character).

* Please mention whether any trailing spaces in the race course should be removed.

Input section
* Please change the three line numbers like this: "<<Line 1>>" (and Lines 2 and 3 similarly, <<>> is the bold syntax).

Output section
* Please add line numbers (there should be 3 lines in total).

Constraints section
* Please delete the first constraint (that should be mentioned in Output section instead, and "sreen" is a typo).

* Please move the third constraint to Goal section as it's a requirement, not a constraint.

* Please fix the typo: "diffenrent" => "different".

* Please mention that there will always be a winner and never a tie.

Stub generator
* Please use the same variable name as other sections ("tomStart" instead of "tomStartPos").

* Please add a write statement (e.g. "write answer").

Thanks.
I have implemented all of the changes. Thank you for the suggestions.

Thank you. Below are my updated comments:

Output section
* Output section is getting a bit wordy here. Please rewrite it using the format of "<<Line _>>: line description" here, so that Line 1 refers to Tom's course, Line 2 refers to Jerry's course and Line 3 refers to the winner message.

* After the rewriting as mentioned, the following lines should be deleted (and as I said, "sreen" is a typo anyway):
"Tom is always shown on the first line and Jerry on the second line of the sreen."
"There should be 3 lines in total"

Goal section
* Please add "on the course filled with the space character" after "at the finish".

* Please mention whether any trailing spaces in the output should be removed.

Constraints section
* Please delete "Distances are represented by space". It is a requirement, not a constraint.

* Please mention that there will always be a winner and never a tie.

Thanks again.

I don't think you get what I'm saying?

Output section
* Delete everything and write in the following way:

<<Line 1>>: The starting and finishing positions of Tom
<<Line 2>>: (etc)
<<Line 3>>: (etc)

Constraints section
* Please delete "Tom is always shown on the first line and Jerry on the second line of the screen."

Thanks.
I have apllied all of changes now. Thanks.
